SELECT REPORT_ID, -- 숨김 REPORT_POST_TYPE, -- 숨김 REPORT_POST_ID, -- 숨김 REPORT_TYPE, REPORT_DETAIL, REPORT_SOLVED, WM.MEMBER_ID AS WRITER_ID, RM.MEMBER_ID AS REPORTER_ID, REPORT_DATE FROM REPORT T LEFT JOIN (SELECT MEMBER_NUM, MEMBER_ID FROM MEMBER) WM ON (WM.MEMBER_NUM = T.WRITER_ID) LEFT JOIN (SELECT MEMBER_NUM, MEMBER_ID FROM MEMBER) RM ON (RM.MEMBER_NUM = T.REPORTER_ID) WHERE 1=1
AND WRITER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{inqKeyword}, '%')
AND REPORTER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{inqKeyword}, '%')
AND REPORT_DETAIL LIKE CONCAT('%', #{inqKeyword}, '%')
AND REPORT_POST_TYPE = #{reportPostType}
AND REPORT_SOLVED = #{reportSolved}
ORDER BY REPORT_DATE
SELECT MSG_CONTENT FROM MESSAGE WHERE MSG_ID = #{postId}
SELECT MAX(REPORT_ID) FROM REPORT WHERE WRITER_ID = #{memberNum}
